GSD.description:
f2fs: remove WARN_ON in f2fs_is_valid_blkaddr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit cd6374af36cc548464d8c47a93fdba7303bb82a4. For more details please see the references link.
